column4: Ubuntu just paid for itself today: I edited an important pdf document and created a new template for letterhead for our non-profit org. My computer literacy program might just get off the ground. I need to come up with a schematic for our floor usage, can anyone recommend a architecture style cad program for Ubuntu that has a shallow learning curve?
dia *may* have something, but be aware that the gui may be a bit crusty on the edges
it's not a cad programme, but it may still fit your needs
